query:
Create a Vue component `src/components/ArticleView.vue` that:

1. Displays article data based on route params `category` and `slug` (e.g., /articles/:category/:slug)
2. Fetches article data whenever any route param changes (including initial load)
3. Shows a loading state while fetching
4. Works correctly when navigating between /articles/tech/ai-future and /articles/science/climate (same component, different params)

The component should properly handle route param changes without relying solely on onMounted.
expected_behavior: Uses watch on route params or onBeforeRouteUpdate
Has immediate option for initial load if using watch
Does not rely solely on onMounted for data fetching
